sen.j: びわ湖わんわん王国（びわこわんわんおうこく）は、滋賀県守山市の琵琶湖岸にあった日本最大級の犬のテーマパーク。
sen.e: Biwako Wan wan Kingdom was Japan's largest canine theme park, and was located on the shores of Lake Biwa, in Moriyama City, Shiga Prefecture.
Biwako Wan wan Kingdom was Japan's largest canine theme park, and was located on the shores of Lake Biwa, in Moriyama City, Shiga Prefecture.
Biwako Wan wan Kingdom was Japan's largest canine theme park, and was located on the shores of Lake Biwa, in Moriyama City, Shiga Prefecture.
It opened on October 31, 1998.
It opened on October 31, 1998.
It opened on October 31, 1998.
Overview
Overview
Summary

sen.j: 「約80種360頭」の犬と出会えるというコンセプトであった。
sen.e: The concept of the theme park was to provide vistors the opportunity to see and interact with "360 dogs from approximately 80 breeds".
The concept of the theme park was to provide vistors the opportunity to see and interact with "360 dogs from approximately 80 breeds".
The concept of the theme park was to provide vistors the opportunity to see and interact with "360 dogs from approximately 80 breeds".

sen.j: 犬のサーカスやショー、レースやパレードも行われ、また一緒に遊んだり散歩（有料）させたりもできた。
sen.e: The park featured dog circuses, races and parades, and even the opportunitey to play with and walk (for an additional fee) dogs.
The park featured dog circuses, races and parades, and even the opportunitey to play with and walk (for an additional fee) dogs.
The park featured dog circuses, races and parades, and even the opportunitey to play with and walk (for an additional fee) dogs.

sen.j: ただし、入場は人に限られ、同伴したペットの犬は入口で預けることになっていた。
sen.e: However, it was only permitted for people to enter the theme park; vistors were not permitted to bring their own dogs into the park with them.
However, it was only permitted for people to enter the theme park; vistors were not permitted to bring their own dogs into the park with them.
However, only people were permitted to enter the theme park; visitors who brought their own dogs had to leave them at the entrance.

sen.j: 「王国の宝物」と呼ばれたショッピングコーナーではさまざまな犬用品が販売されていた。
sen.e: A variety of goods for your pet dog were available for purchase at the shopping corner called "Treasures of the Kingdom".
A variety of goods for your pet dog were available for purchase at the shopping corner called "Treasures of the Kingdom".
A variety of goods for your pet dog were available for purchase at the shopping corner called "Treasures of the Kingdom".

sen.j: また「びわ公」という高さ13mの犬の木像があり、顔部分は展望台もかねていた。
sen.e: There was also a 13m wooden statue of a dog called "Biwa Kimi", the face of which had an observation deck.
sen.cmt: Considering that Biwako is the name of the lake, this is probably the reading.
sen.e: There was also a 13m wooden statue of a dog called "Biwa Kimi", the face of which had an observation deck.
There was also a 13m wooden statue of a dog called "Biwa Ko", the face of which had an observation deck.

sen.j: 開園当初は、年間70万人が訪れてにぎわったが、2005年1月31日に閉鎖した。
sen.e: The park was visited by 700,000 people per year after it opened, but it closed on january 31,2005.
The park was visited by 700,000 people per year after it opened, but it closed on january 31,2005.
The park was visited by 700,000 people per year after it opened, but it closed on January 31, 2005.

sen.j: 所在地：滋賀県守山市今浜町2620番地5
sen.e: Location: 2620-5 Imahama-cho, Moriyama City, Shiga Prefecture
Location: 2620-5 Imahama-cho, Moriyama City, Shiga Prefecture
Location: 2620-5 Imahama-cho, Moriyama City, Shiga Prefecture

sen.j: 入場料（閉園直前のデータ）大人（中学生以上） 1,800円
sen.e: Entrance fee (data for period immediately preceding closing of the park): Adults, 1,800 yen
Entrance fee (data for period immediately preceding closing of the park): Adults, 1,800 yen
Entrance fee (data for period immediately preceding closing of the park): Adults (junior high school age and over), 1,800 yen
Senior citizens, 1,600 yen
Senior citizens, 1,600 yen
Senior citizens (over 65 years old), 1,600 yen
Children (from 4 years of age through elementary school), 900 yen
Children (from 4 years of age through elementary school), 900 yen
Children (from 4 years of age through elementary school), 900 yen
Site
Site
Remained site

sen.j: 2008年9月20日、わんわん王国跡地に県内最大規模の大型ショッピングモール「ピエリ守山」が開業した。
sen.e: On September 20, 2008, the largest shopping mall in ShigaPrefecture, "Pieri Moriyama", was opened on the former site of Biwako Wan Wan Kingdom.
On September 20, 2008, the largest shopping mall in ShigaPrefecture, "Pieri Moriyama", was opened on the former site of Biwako Wan Wan Kingdom.
On September 20, 2008, the largest shopping mall in Shiga Prefecture, 'Pieri Moriyama', was opened on the former site of Biwako Wan Wan Kingdom.

sen.j: 飲食店、衣料品店、雑貨販売店など約200店舗が出店し、湖岸の立地を生かして琵琶湖汽船のクルーズ船も寄航する。
sen.e: The mall is host to approximately 200 shops, including clothings shops, eateries, sundry goods stores and the like, and taking advantage of the sites locatoin on the shore of Lake Biwa, the mall provides docking facilities for the Biwa Kisen steamboat, which offers cruises on Lake Biwa.

The mall is host to approximately 200 shops, including clothings shops, eateries, sundry goods stores and the like, and taking advantage of the sites locatoin on the shore of Lake Biwa, the mall provides docking facilities for the Biwa Kisen steamboat, which offers cruises on Lake Biwa.

The mall is host to approximately 200 shops, including eateries, clothing shops, sundry goods stores and the like, and taking advantage of the site's location on the shore of Lake Biwa, the Biwa Kisen steamboat also stops here, giving visitors the chance to take a cruise on Lake Biwa.
